BotEnvironment.SearchBot
Class Bot

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      BotEnvironment.SearchBot.Bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotSearch
public abstract class Bot
extends java.lang.Thread

Bot is the abstract base class for different types of bots. From this class, a bot can be a reflex agent, model-based agent, search agent, etc.

protected void setStartingLocation(Node startingLocation)
Sets the starting location for the bot in the map. This is only be called when a map is opened.

Parameters:
startingLocation - The starting location for the bot.

enableAutoStepping

public void enableAutoStepping(boolean autoStep)
Enables and disables autostepping.

Parameters:

Resets the bot to the starting location and sets the movement cost to zero.

step

public abstract void step()
The method to override with what to do at each bot step.

run

public void run()
Calls the step method every amount of milliseconds as defined in SBConstants.DELAY as long as autostepping is enabled.
